name: Death Roll (jazzbox)
description:
Roll the dice to avoid demons. Your spells only work if you're on the right number.

  • Right Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Left Mouse Button - Roll

Asset Acknowledgments - none of the assets visual or audio assets were developed by me or for this Jam (I'm a solo coder).

Dice & UI: Kenney

Wizard and Monsters: https://0x72.itch.io/ (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii)

Font: Dafont.com (https://www.dafont.com/ghoulish-fright-aoe.font?l[]=10&l[]=1)

Music: https://lunalucid.itch.io/

Sound Effects: Kenney
